ending (optional) ending (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 e1 o1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
G
You are beautiful beyond description
Too marvelous for words
Too wonderful for comprehension
Like nothing ever seen or heard

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Who can grasp Your infinite wisdom
Who can fathom the depth of Your love
You are beautiful beyond description
Majesty enthroned above

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I stand I stand in awe of You
I stand I stand in awe of You
Holy God to Whom all praise is due
I stand in awe of You

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
And we stand we stand in awe of You
we stand we stand in awe of You
Holy God to Whom all praise is due
we stand in awe of You

verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
And we stand we stand in love with You
we stand we stand in love with You
Holy God to Whom all praise is due
we stand in love with You

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
You are beautiful beyond description
Yet God crushed you for my sin
In agony and deep affliction
Cut off that I might enter in

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Who can grasp such tender compassion
Who can fathom this mercy so free
You are beautiful beyond compassion
Lamb of God who died for me
